sentence.Network_en: Soft living will enervate the leaders, and those under their command will be changed into beasts.
sentence.Network_cn: 舒适的生命会弱化领导者, 在他们命令之下的会变成了兽.

bind fetter使衰弱，使衰老 enfeeble enervatedebilitate weaken

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin enervat- 'weakened (by extraction of the sinews'), from the verb enervare, from e- (variant of ex-) 'out of' + nervus 'sinew'

means.word_mean: 使感到衰弱（或虚弱、无力）

sentences.en: Idleness enervates the will to succeed.
sentences.cn: 懒惰削弱了成功的决心。

sentences.en: A hot climate enervates people who are not used to it.
sentences.cn: 热的气候使不习惯于热的人衰弱无力。
